alert.note: Alert for New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 6:55AM EST until December 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Connecticut... Yantic River near Yantic affecting New London County. For the Yantic River...including Yantic...Moderate flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yantic River near Yantic. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding along Otrobando Avenue at the Fitness World, Pleasant Street bridge and along Town Street at the Norwichtown Mall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:46 AM EST Monday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:46 AM EST Monday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.8 feet on 04/11/1993. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am EST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Yantic River Yantic 9.0 9.6 Mon 6 am EST 7.5 4.7 MSG &&
